layout.name: startAngle
layout.title: Start Angle
layout.tooltip: Initial angle of the Launch Barrel in degrees.

layout.name: rotSpeed
layout.title: Speed
layout.tooltip: Rotation speed of the Launch Barrel, in degrees per tick.

layout.name: interval
layout.title: Interval
layout.tooltip: Rotation interval of the Launch Barrel, in degrees.

layout.name: power
layout.title: Power
layout.tooltip: The force at which the player is shot out of the Launch Barrel.

layout.name: flipTime
layout.title: Flip direction delay
layout.tooltip: How long before a rotating barrel starts flipping in the opposite direction, in ticks.

layout.name: counttimer
layout.title: Timer
layout.tooltip: How long before the player is forced out of the cannon (the number initially displayed on the sprite).

layout.name: skullbarrel
layout.title: Destroyed on use?
layout.tooltip: Check to make the barrel explode when fired, this behaviour is intended for Skull Barrels.

layout.name: trackerDir
layout.title: Tracker Barrel direction?
layout.tooltip: Setting one of these will make the Tracker Barrel specifically either move horizontally or vertically.

layout.name: trackerTrueTrack
layout.title: Chase only after entered
layout.tooltip: If checked, the Tracker Barrel will not chase the player until they enter it.

layout.name: visTime
layout.title: Time being visible
layout.tooltip: How long a Boo Barrel stays visible for.

layout.name: invisTime
layout.title: Time being invisible
layout.tooltip: How long a Boo Barrel stays inisible for.
